attributes.action: ask justice secretary Jack Straw to resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the disgustingly leniant sentences given out to baby P's killers, the murders of two young french men by a psychopath,the conning of families with the openess of family courts and the support given to judges that have committed misconduct and also the fact that Mr Straws son and brother have both been guilty of offences we feel he should resign

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
